00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value
00028 #error_reporting( E_ALL | E_STRICT );

00030 /**
00031  * Debug utilities
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 final class tx_oop_Debug_Utils
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * 
00042      */
00043     private function __construct()
00044     {}
00045     
00046     /**
00047      * 
00048      */
00049     private static function _getVarType( &$var )
00050     {
00051         $type = 'unknown';
00052         
00053         if( is_object( $var ) ) {
00054             
00055             $type = 'object';
00056             
00057         } elseif( is_resource( $var ) ) {
00058             
00059             $type = 'ressource';
00060             
00061         } elseif( is_array( $var ) ) {
00062             
00063             $type = 'array';
00064             
00065         } elseif( is_string( $var ) ) {
00066             
00067             $type = 'string';
00068             
00069         } elseif( is_int( $var ) ) {
00070             
00071             $type = 'int';
00072             
00073         } elseif( is_link( $var ) ) {
00074             
00075             $type = 'link';
00076             
00077         } elseif( is_float( $var ) ) {
00078             
00079             $type = 'float';
00080             
00081         } elseif( is_null( $var ) ) {
00082             
00083             $type = 'null';
00084             
00085         } elseif( is_bool( $var ) ) {
00086             
00087             $type = 'boolean';
00088         }
00089         
00090         return $type;
00091     }
00092     
00093     /**
00094      * 
00095      */
00096     public static function viewArray( array $array, $return = false )
00097     {
00098         $commonStyle          = 'font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #898989; ';
00099         
00100         $container            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00101         $container[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle;
00102         
00103         $container->comment( 'PHP array debug  - start' );
00104         
00105         $table                = $container->table;
00106         $table[ 'style' ]     = 'background-color: #EDF5FA; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00107         
00108         $container->comment( 'PHP array debug - end' );
00109         
00110         foreach( $array as $key => &$value ) {
00111             
00112             $varType = self::_getVarType( $value );
00113             
00114             $row = $table->tr;
00115             
00116             $labelCol = $row->td;
00117             $dataCol  = $row->td;
00118             
00119             $labelCol[ 'width' ] = '20%';
00120             $labelCol[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle . 'background-color: #FFFFFF; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00121             $dataCol[ 'style' ]  = $commonStyle . 'background-color: #FFFFFF; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00122             
00123             $label            = $labelCol->strong;
00124             $label[ 'style' ] = 'color: #0062A0;';
00125             $labelCol->span   = ': ' . $varType;
00126             $label->addTextData( $key );
00127             
00128             if( is_array( $value ) ) {
00129                 
00130                 $dataCol->addTextData( self::viewArray( $value, true ) );
00131                 
00132             } elseif( is_object( $value ) ) {
00133                 
00134                 $dataCol->div->pre = print_r( $value, true );
00135                 
00136             } elseif( is_bool( $var ) ) {
00137                 
00138                 $value = ( $value ) ? 'true' : 'false';
00139                 $dataCol->addTextData( $value );
00140                 
00141             } else {
00142                 
00143                 $dataCol->addTextData( $value );
00144             }
00145         }
00146         
00147         if( $return ) {
00148             
00149             return $container;
00150         }
00151         
00152         print ( string )$container;
00153     }
00154     
00155     /**
00156      * 
00157      */
00158     public function debug( $var, $return = false, $header = 'Debug informations' )
00159     {
00160         $commonStyle          = 'font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #898989; ';
00161         
00162         $container            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00163         $container[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle . 'background-color: #EDF5FA; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00164         
00165         $container->comment( 'PHP variable debug  - start' );
00166         
00167         $headerSection            = $container->div;
00168         $headerSection[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle . 'text-align: center; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00169         $headerText               = $headerSection->strong;
00170         $headerText[ 'style' ]    = 'color: #0062A0; font-size: 15px';
00171         $headerText->addTextData( $header );
00172         
00173         $typeSection            = $container->div;
00174         $typeSection[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle . 'background-color: #FFFFFF; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00175         $typeText               = $typeSection->strong;
00176         $typeText[ 'style' ]    = 'color: #0062A0;';
00177         $typeSection->span      = self::_getVarType( $var );
00178         $typeText->addTextData( 'Variable type:' );
00179         
00180         $container->comment( 'PHP variable debug - end' );
00181         
00182         $dataDiv            = $container->div;
00183         $dataDiv[ 'style' ] = $commonStyle . 'background-color: #FFFFFF; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 2px; padding: 2px;';
00184         
00185         if( is_array( $var ) ) {
00186             
00187             $dataDiv->addTextData( self::viewArray( $var, true ) );
00188             
00189         } elseif( is_object( $var ) ) {
00190                 
00191                 $dataDiv->pre = print_r( $var, true );
00192                 
00193             } elseif( is_bool( $value ) ) {
00194                 
00195                 $value = ( $var ) ? 'true' : 'false';
00196                 $dataDiv->addTextData( $value );
00197                 
00198             } else {
00199                 
00200                 $dataDiv->addTextData( $var );
00201             }
00202         
00203         if( $return ) {
00204             
00205             return $container;
00206         }
00207         
00208         print ( string )$container;
00209     }
00210 }
